pageProduct.name: Sukin Purely Ageless Pro Rejuvenating Serum 25ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Our Intensive Rejuvenating Serum features Bakuchiol, a natural alternative to Retinol, with Yellow Calla Lily Extract and Hyaluronic Acid. Clinically proven to visibly firm and plump skin in just 14 days, it will leave your skin visibly smoother and younger-looking.

Warnings

This product contains natural active ingredients. Patch testing and gradual introduction is recommended. If irritation occurs reduce frequency or discontinue use & seek medical advice. For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. 

Common Uses

98% of users saw a visible improvement in the appearance and condition of their skin. *using total Purely Ageless PRO range.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Bakuchiol, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Zantedeschia Elliottiana Flower Extract (Yellow Calla Lily), Davidsonia Jerseyana Fruit Extract (Davidson Plum), Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Lysolecithin, Sclerotium Gum, Pullulan, Xanthan Gum, Silica, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Citric Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Fragrance (Parfum)*, Linalool**, Citronellol**, Limonene**, Geraniol**. *Natural Fragrance **Component of Natural Fragrance

Directions

APPLICATION: After cleansing, apply 3-5 drops to face, neck and décolletage using a gentle upward motion.
